::DrillBit::

DrillBit grabed Land Mine. He ran to Time Bomb, and picked him up.
"Beast Mode." He says, transforming, and drilling under ground, and
away, wile still holding Time Bomb and Land Mine.

OOC: I hope grabing Land Mine and Time Bomb is ok.
